benchmark_details.name: MyCulture
benchmark_details.overview: MyCulture is a benchmark designed to comprehensively evaluate large language models (LLMs) on Malaysian culture across six pillars: arts, attire, customs, entertainment, food, and religion presented in Bahasa Melayu. It employs a novel open-ended multiple-choice question format without predefined options to reduce guessing and mitigate format bias.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate LLMsâ€™ understanding and alignment with Malaysian cultural knowledge.

data.source: Expert-validated questions curated to reflect diverse races, religions, and ethnicities in Malaysia.

methodology.calculation: Performance is calculated based on the correctness of culturally sensitive responses generated by the LLMs.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better understanding of Malaysian culture.
methodology.validation: Models evaluated under zero-shot settings across multiple question formats.
